condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).

description.narrative: The IRRF is UNDP’s results framework to monitor and report on its achievements against the Strategic Plan 2018-2021. UNDP publishes country level IRRF results that UNDP’s projects contributed to

Country has adopted and implemented, with UNDP assistance, legal and regulatory frameworks that enable civil society to function in the public sphere and contribute to sustainable development: Groups representing other marginalised populations

Country has adopted and implemented, with UNDP assistance, legal and regulatory frameworks that enable civil society to function in the public sphere and contribute to sustainable development: Women's groups

Country has adopted and implemented, with UNDP assistance, legal and regulatory frameworks that enable civil society to function in the public sphere and contribute to sustainable development: Youth groups
Natural resources that are managed under a sustainable use, conservation, access and benefit-sharing regime: Area of land under sustainable land management regime (hectares)
Natural resources that are managed under a sustainable use, conservation, access and benefit-sharing regime: Number of shared water ecosystems (fresh or marine) under cooperative management
Number of micro, small and medium-sized enterprises utilizing supplier development platforms for inclusive and sustainable value chains
Country has frameworks in place to prevent and respond to SGBV: Multi-sectoral policy and legislation
Country has frameworks in place to prevent and respond to SGBV: Multi-sectoral services including justice and security
Country has frameworks in place to prevent and respond to SGBV: Platforms for raising awareness and social mobilisation
Country has gender-responsive measures in place for conservation, sustainable use, and equitable access to and benefit sharing of natural resources, biodiversity and ecosystems: Financing frameworks

Country has gender-responsive measures in place for conservation, sustainable use, and equitable access to and benefit sharing of natural resources, biodiversity and ecosystems: Institutional frameworks
Country has gender-responsive measures in place for conservation, sustainable use, and equitable access to and benefit sharing of natural resources, biodiversity and ecosystems: Policy frameworks
Parliament has improved capacities to undertake inclusive, effective and accountable law-making
Proportion of women in leadership positions within social dialogue and reconciliation mechanisms that promote peaceful, just and inclusive societies Women in leadership positions
Proportion of GBV cases reported to authorities receiving judgment in the formal justice system Total number of GBV cases reported
Proportion of GBV cases reported to authorities receiving judgment in the formal justice system Number of cases that received judgment
Proportion of women in leadership positions within social dialogue and reconciliation mechanisms that promote peaceful, just and inclusive societies Total leadership positions
Natural resources that are managed under a sustainable use, conservation, access and benefit-sharing regime: Area of existing protected area under improved management (hectares)
Proportion of GBV cases reported to authorities receiving judgment in the formal justice system Proportion of GBV cases judged
Number of people accessing basic services, disaggregated by target groups Displaced people accessing basic services
Number of people accessing basic services, disaggregated by target groups Displaced people eligible for basic services
Number of people accessing basic services, disaggregated by target groups Other marginalised people accessing basic services
Number of people accessing basic services, disaggregated by target groups Other marginalised people eligible for basic services (Specify marginalise type in CO comments box)
Number of people accessing basic services, disaggregated by target groups People accessing basic services
Number of people accessing basic services, disaggregated by target groups People eligible for basic services
Number of people accessing basic services, disaggregated by target groups People with disabilities accessing basic services
Number of people accessing basic services, disaggregated by target groups People with disabilities eligible for basic services
Number of people accessing basic services, disaggregated by target groups Poor people accessing basic services
Number of people accessing basic services, disaggregated by target groups Poor people eligible for basic services

Number of people accessing basic services, disaggregated by target groups Women eligible for basic services
